sentences: They released four albums on Play It Again Sam, one of the more important indie labels, which were also licensed to Wax Trax in the US and Canada.
Aldo Ivancic later formed the band Bast, and is famous in the Slovenian music scene today as a producer.
Goran Devide, video (1982, died in Maribor in 1988)
Bruno Subiotto, lead vocals (1991–1993, 1996, died in Ljubljana on July 7, 2016)
And Man Created God (Metropolis Records, 10 June 2014)
